Description:
North Facing 14x32 Block To Build Your Dream Home!
Great opportunity to secure this 448m2 (14x32 approx.) block of land in the famous Edgebrook Estate in Clyde. Everything you need is within easy reach. Ideally located close Cranbourne train station, primary and secondary schools, shops and amenities. Wonderfully positioned Edgebrook is set between Tuckers and Pattersons Road, Clyde.
To secure this opportunity Call Vicky Arora on 0430205545

Description:
Invest Or Nest
This 3 bedroom home, located in the convenient Pasadena Estate will give first home buyers, investors and downsizers a gorgeous, low maintenance property that they can call their own without the huge price tag.
Inside you are greeted with flowing timber laminate floors making it easy to maintain with the bedrooms carpeted for warmth in the cold Melbourne winter's. The family/meals area is saturated with lots of natural light and is overlooked by a functional kitchen that provides quality appliances and stone bench tops for the MasterChef in all of us. Adjoining the living area is the master bedroom, which boasts a full ensuit and walk in robe.
Close to schools, shops, public transport and parks this home will certainly tick all the boxes if you are looking to buy on a budget. Extras in this home include gas ducted heating, split system cooling, gorgeous low maintenance garden, remote controlled roller door on the single garage, walking distance to amenities, high ceilings and so much more.
Situated on 189m2 of land this exceptionally low maintenance property will be one that you need to put on your shopping list to see. Call Metin today on 8785 0377

Description:
Potential 8 lot development
Alex Scott and Staff are proud to present, this very private 3 bedroom ranch style family home, set on a lovely 1 acre of gardens. Currently zoned urban growth and offering not only a great family atmosphere, but also enormous potential for investment and capital growth.
Features a large formal lounge with timber floors and a wood heater, ducted heating, a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, lots of cupboard and bench space and overlooks the paved patio/bbq area, a tiled meals area with air conditioning, 3 big bedrooms with robes, ensuite and a huge laundry.
Outside is a double garage, a separate carport for a caravan, 2 separate work sheds, 2 driveways and all this overlooks other large acreage properties, offering a private semi rural lifestyle, yet all within close proximity to schools, shops, parks and with easy access to both the city and bays. A great all round package, come see for yourself.

Description:
Pristine Four Bedroom Home~
Constructed less than a year ago, this immaculately presented home offers outstanding value for money and with nothing left to do just move in and enjoy your new home.
Set in the Belmond on Clyde Estate you will see as soon as you arrive at 5 Kamona Street Clyde the time and effort the current owners have put in to the attention to detail from the landscaping, decked porch and exposed aggregate driveways and paths.
Once you step inside the home you will be greeted by display quality presentation, with neutral and clean tones offering four bedrooms, master bedroom at the entry of the home with built in robe and full ensuite while the remaining three bedrooms are at the rear of the property all with built in robes and with easy access to the family bathroom and separate toilet.
The kitchen is all you could hope for with beautiful stone benches, 900mm gas cooktop and oven, dishwasher and ample storage including light walk in pantry.
Over looking the beautiful sun lit family and adjoining meals area which opens up to your low maintenance wrap around courtyard.
Creature comforts of the home include – high ceilings, gas ducted heating, 5kw split system cooling and double lock up garage.
A park only a short stroll away and a short drive to amenities located in the townships of Clyde and Cranbourne, this sensational opportunity is only minutes away from popular education facilities, such as the Clyde Primary School & Casey Grammar, Casey RACE Recreation/Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre. With multiple shopping precincts available in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club, local amenities are always going to be close by. The recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre offers an abundance of cafes and restaurants and don't forget the proposed Cranbourne East train station, or the existing ones situated right throughout the South East!
Contact Hayley on 0488 049 143 for further information and to book your private viewing.
Insights: 5 Kamona Street, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Radiant Family Living
Give the family space, light and serenity in a magnificent single level home set in the prestigious Pasadena Estate in Clyde. Serenely situated, this stunning family residence will impress even the most astute buyer. With schools, shops and public transport all within walking distance, this location is second to none. The home has been well designed to incorporate everyone's needs. Once inside, the grand floor plan begins with an imposing wide entrance, sleek tiling and striking high ceilings. The master bedroom is inclusive of a magnificent ensuite and large walk-in robe, along with three no-less impressive bedrooms all featuring generous proportions with built in robes, family bathroom and separate toilet to accommodate. The open galley kitchen with caeser stone island bench integrates with the expansive family and dining rooms with access to the rumpus room, large walk in pantry, 5 burner gas cook top, the clever floor plan design ensures the hub of the home is central to all. If you are an entertainer, then this property will continue to amaze you outside. Stepping through sliding doors, both pets and children will enjoy playing outside with an incredible expansive covered alfresco and pergola area with an outdoor kitchen, together with a separated seating area that encourages entertaining to integrate indoor and outdoor living with a breeze. The home is also complete with automated (Nest) ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, ceiling fans, ducted vacuum, fibre optic internet, landscaped gardens, garden shed, modern fittings throughout, high ceilings, large laundry, oversized double car garage with internal and rear access, downlights, quality light fittings and much much more. Pasadena estate is the place to be due to a true family friendly lifestyle. Beautiful children's parks and walking tracks offer plenty of space to explore, Casey fields and Casey RACE are only a stone throw away and all this is only a moment's drive to local schools. Not to mention the property is also just a short walk to Shopping on Clyde. Do not miss out on this opportunity call now to book your inspection!
Insights: 6 Cradle Avenue, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Cre8. Negoti8. Celebr8!
STYLISH CARLISLE HOME!
A statement of contemporary style and design, focusing on family entertainment, comfort and convenience, this beautiful family home is an example of modern design and a friendly layout.
Located in the Clyde's sought after Eliston Estate, this spacious and comfortable family nest is situated a short distance away from Selandra Rise shopping centre , St Thomas The Apostle Primary School and other amenities. An opportunity not to be missed, Only a few minutes from Berwick!
Main features include:
4 Spacious bedrooms, master with WIR and full ensuite complimented by balcony with great views and the other three bedrooms with BIR
3 generous living zones which includes a formal lounge, a large open plan family room and an upstairs retreat area.
Fully appointed quality kitchen with stone benchtops, 900mm modern stainless steel stove and range hood, dishwasher and walk in pantry
2 bathrooms and a powder room
Double garage with internal access
Spacious driveway with easy access to rear of property
Entertain in style with a superb alfresco area leading out to a fresh landscaped garden
Additional features include high ceilings, down-lights, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, fine carpets, beautiful tiles and much more...
PHOTO ID IS REQUIRED ON ALL INSPECTIONS
“Selling? You’ll be SOLD with our $8,800 Success Fee“

Description:
Quality 40 sq ex-Henley display masterpiece
Set on approximately 510m2, this magnificent four-bedroom Henley ex-display home is the epitome of quality, comfort, space and style. Situated in the boutique and established Pasadena Estate, it oozes class and indulgence – pictures really are a thousand words. Sprawling over approx. 40 sq. and two levels you will be spoilt with quality upgrades, a multitude of flexible living spaces throughout and the convenience of having local shops and parklands right at your doorstep.
Comprising of:
Ground Floor:
• Designer gourmet kitchen - complete with quality Technika appliances including two 600mm ovens, built-in coffee machine, dishwasher and microwave, and oversized island bench with 20mm Caesarstone, undermount sink and flexi hose sink mixer.
• Butler's pantry with sink, quality shelving and under bench cabinetry.
• 20mm Caesarstone throughout including kitchens, bathrooms, ensuite and powder rooms.
• Large decked portico entrance with pivot feature door and security intercom system.
• Spacious study/home office for those that work from home.
• Formal lounge or theatre room for those movie nights in.
• Huge open plan family lounge and dining area adjoining the alfresco and overlooking the spacious backyard with established gardens.
• Timber stacker sliding doors opening-up to a fantastic decked alfresco with fan – perfect for entertaining a large crowd.
• Powder room for guests.
• Double garage with internal access to the home.
First Floor:
• Luxurious master suite with private balcony with views of the Dandenong Ranges, huge WIR and full ensuite with double vanity, oversized shower, separate toilet and spa bath.
• Three more generous bedrooms – two with walk-in robes and the 3rd with built in robes.
• 3rd lounge / retreat to relax.
• Family bathroom and separate powder room.
Extras include:
Refrigerated cooling & ducted gas heating, double glazing, 8 Star Energy Rating, LED downlights and pendant fittings, stone benches throughout, alarm system, many feature walls, network cabling, exposed aggregate driveway, architectural square set cornices to living areas, high ceilings, solar heated hot water backed up by continuous flow, solar lights to all toilets, fully landscaped gardens front & rear, shed for storage – THE LIST GOES ON!
Insights: 71 Green Gully Road, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
PICTURE PERFECT IN PASADENA ESTATE
CLYDE: If you are looking for a property offering outstanding value for money and quietly placed in a serene location then this is the right property for you! Located in the highly sought-after Pasadena Estate, this three-year-old home will suit both first home buyers and investors alike.
Built by Porter Davis, this 6-star energy rated home offers four bedrooms, open plan living zones, a study and with quality, style and functionality throughout, it is sure to meet the expectations of the most discerning home buyers. With outdoor living options equally impressive, it is perfect for any family dynamic looking for a refreshing lifestyle all year round.
The property is just a short stroll to the Shopping on Clyde and moments away from shops, schools, parks and public transport. The Casey RACE and the Casey Fields are just a short distance away. It is almost impossible to find a turn key house in a fantastic neighbourhood such as this lovely home.
With a long list of inclusions these homes do not last long, so please make time to come and inspect this pristine property.
Added internal and external features include;
* Approximately 21.5 sq under roof line
* Approximately 270 sqm land
* Porter Davis built home
* 6-star energy rating
* Double glazed windows
* Open plan living
* Walk in pantry
* Caesar stone bench tops to kitchen
* 600mm oven and cook top
* Dishwasher
* Ducted heating
* Master with full en suite
* Master with walk in robe
* Separate study/reading area upstairs
* Three toilets including powder room
* Timber laminate flooring downstairs
* Access to laundry from garage
* Spacious cupboards to laundry
* Storage under stairs
* Clothesline, fly-screens
* Remote control garage door
* Solar assisted hot water
* Stunning views from first floor windows
* Extended undercover decking area
* East facing facade
* 2 large Veggie patches
* Well kept, landscaped garden with citrus trees
* Hill Farm Park is located across the road
- Shopping on Clyde is approximately ten minutes' walk away from the house
- St. Thomas the Apostle Catholic Primary School is approximately three minutes' drive away from the house
- Willandra Rise Primary School is approximately six minutes' drive away from the house
- Pasadena Park is approximately 4 minutes' walk away from the house
- Casey RACE is approximately four minutes' drive away from the house
- Casey Fields is approximately nine minutes' drive away from the house
- Royal Botanic Gardens Cranbourne seven minutes' drive away from the house
**PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS**
**Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans**

Description:
YOUNG AND EXCITING!
This property is currently tenanted on a month to month basis with a return of $420 per week. This beautiful 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is located in the ever popular Pasadena Estate in Clyde. All bedrooms are located upstairs, the main is of generous size and offers a very spacious ensuite and walk in robe. The 3 additional bedrooms are complete with wardrobes and are serviced by the main bathroom. Central to the bedrooms is the spacious children's retreat. Downstairs you enter through the front double doors of this 3 year old home and you are greeted with an open foyer and a cozy formal lounge room. You also have the convenience of a powder room downstairs. You'll be impressed with the open plan design which offers you a family room, large meals area impressive galley kitchen with stone bench tops, 900ml free stand oven, range hood and dishwasher all appliances are stainless steel. Additional inclusions are internal access from garage, study nook, walk in pantry, ducted heating and evaporated cooling. Two double slide doors out to the alfresco area is ideal for entertaining with summer coming on. With only minutes to the local bus service, Shopping on Clyde, Casey Fields Sports Complex plus Casey Race Indoor Swim Centre. This is a must see!
Insights: 33 Green Gully Road, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
QUALITY & CLASS
Situated in the prestigious Belmond Estate and first time on the market by its original owners is this quality near new residence which allows you to grab your furniture with nothing to do except to just move in. Set on an impressive 507sqm rectangular block and boasting a range of upgraded features makes this a must-see home for all buyers. The residence itself has been meticulously maintained and is a worthy home or astute investment for the future. Offering a wonderful layout combining multiple indoor and outdoor living areas all finished with 4 genuine bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2 toilets completing a total of 32 squares (Approx).
Highlighted by a stunning chefs kitchen complete with all upgraded appliances, Caesar-stone benches and a walk-in butler's pantry. Entertaining will be a delight with a home cinema room and a wonderful outdoor alfresco and extended decking. Outside is highlighted by manicured low maintained gardens both front and rear providing easy maintenance for the keen gardener with ample space for the kids and pets.
Features
Big 32 Squares in size.
4 good size bedrooms,Master with full en-suite
Carpets in all the bedrooms & tiles in hallway, kitchen & wet areas
3 Separate living areas with separate dining space
Theater room with OHP points & sound proof insulation
Fully decked alfresco with ceiling fan
Full landscaped, fenced front and back yard
Extra insulation on top of the roof
Security CCTV cameras around the house
Active zoned alarm system
Perfectly positioned amongst other quality homes and within minutes to bus stops, Casey Fields, Casey Race with Clyde Primary & St Thomas the Apostle Primary and St Peters Collage Secondary all within moments away. Conveniently located within minutes to both Shopping on Clyde & Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre with Cranbourne station only a short distance away. Handy proximity to South Gippsland Highway providing quick access to the South East and Mornington corridor.
*Please note, photo ID is to be presented upon inspection.

Description:
Premium Titled Block in Edgebrook Estate
If you're looking for generous block size, convenient location and to be part of a newly establish community - look no further .This perfect block of 400 sq. m. land is located in a prime, thriving and beautifully placed Edgebrook Estate in the highly sought out and well-established suburb, "Clyde".
Edgebrook Estate offers a myriad of brilliant opportunities and facilities for the proud future residents which will surely impress:
*This is close to fantastic schools, shopping, childcare, community centres. Within Edgebrook are planned parks with playgrounds, BBQ's and public artworks.
*Edgebrook is where community spirit will thrive. This vision will come to life with a carefully designed masterplan and future central park focused on bringing the community together .
*This is just 5 minutes away from two shopping centres with supermarkets and specialty stores. Westfield Fountain Gate is a simple 20-25 minute drive.
*Planned creek-front walkways and bikeways within the community will encourage active lifestyles. Situated in the Casey Council area, countless recreational and sporting facilities are nearby.
*Medical care is nearby, at Amstel Medical Centre and Cranbourne Park Family Care Clinic. Casey Hospital (public) in Berwick is only a short 18 minute drive away.
*Edgebrook is located close to a number of highly regarded private and government, primary and secondary schools.
*Within the Edgebrook community is heritage house Wilandra. Wilandra is a prominent homestead that was built for the Clyde family who contributed much to the area's agricultural history. The house has stood on the same land since 1892.
This spectacular block of perfectly rectangular land offers impressive dimensions:
• 400 sq.m block
• Titled & Ready to build
Frontage: 12.5 m
Depth Right: 32 m
Depth Left: 32 m
Rear: 12.5 m
Call Bal on 0413 870 550 or Mark on 0425 400 600 now for more details as this one won't last long.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklistshow less

Description:
VALUE HERE! TITLED 458m NORTH/WEST FACING CORNER BLOCK IN ELISTON ESTATE CLYDE
Why wait 18 months when you can start building now? Take advantage today of this north-west facing, well positioned block with 20m frontage and no easement!
While ideally located close to the established amenities of Berwick and Cranbourne, the Eliston estate will itself be blessed with an impressive range of lifestyle facilities. Open spaces abound in each connected neighbourhood, as residents come to embrace Clyde's future major town centre, parks and sporting ovals, bike lanes, primary school and childcare, a recreation centre and future train station.
Discover the further delights that await you in our fresh new master planned community, with a new primary school and childcare centre, 3 ovals and 4 parks, plus fast internet access.
Take a drive past and call Darren today on 0417-509006. Dare to compare - this block is priced to sell!

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
PASADENA ESTATE, CLYDE: **PLEASE NOTE THAT THE GARAGE ROLLER DOOR PANELS WILL BE REPLACED UPON SETTLEMENT** The suburb of Clyde is a flourishing neighbourhood with several new estates popping up in quick succession, but there is always the problem of having to wait lengthy periods for your land to title and for construction to commence.
So, why not purchase a near new home like this one in the beautiful Pasadena estate allowing you to literally move in and enjoy or rent out with ease?
Sitting high and mighty on an elevated block with a feature front rock retaining wall, the property's facade is very welcoming with its rendered accents, covered front portico and remote double garage.
Step inside and be greeted by display quality presentation that further adds to the overall appeal. The functional floorplan itself includes a North facing living and dining room with floating floors as well as a stylish kitchen complete with stone bench tops, all stainless steel appliances and a walk in pantry.
There is plenty of room for a young family too with 4 robed bedrooms, the master with a walk-in wardrobe and a full ensuite. Don't forget the family bathroom, second toilet and the bonus option of a 2nd sitting room that can also double up as a home office or children's play retreat.
Ducted heating and 2 split system air conditioners provide year round comfort, whilst outside the care free rear yard requires very little maintenance!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne, this sensational opportunity is only minutes away from popular education facilities, such as the Clyde Primary School & Casey Grammar, Casey RACE Recreation/Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre. With multiple shopping precincts available in Pasadena itself, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club, local amenities are always going to be close by. The recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre offers an abundance of cafes and restaurants and don't forget the proposed Cranbourne East train station, or the existing ones situated right throughout the South East!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
A shopping centre right at your doorstep, Clyde Primary & Cranbourne East primary only a 5 minute drive, close to Casey fields, wonderful parks and walking tracks; this 3 year old beauty is offering not just a brilliant home but a fantastic lifestyle in the Pasadena Estate.
Up for grabs is 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, master providing a walk-in robe, full ensuite and is serviced with a split system. All secondary bedrooms are fitted with built in robes. Whilst the bedrooms are carpeted the rest of the home has stunning floating floorboards.
This luxury home offers a remarkable floor plan, consisting of an open kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops providing optimal space, electric oven and loads of cupboard space and overlooks the dinning are. The lounge area is inclusive of a split system to keep you warm whilst watching your favourite movies in these winter months.
Convenient access from the family dining area to a cemented outdoor area for entertainment all year round with little to no maintenance required.
Be sure to inspect!
All information contained herein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.

Description:
BRAND NEW ! LUXURIOUS ! MOVE IN NOW !!
You will love to come home to this contemporary & luxurious home with its high ceilings, accommodating floor plan and warm and inviting atmosphere.
Front Study room, master with walkin robes & ensuite, three more spacious bedrooms, modern kitchen with stone benchtops (with breakfast table), 900mm stainless steel cooktop & oven, dishwasher, ample storage space and spacious backyard ideal for the kids to play or have a BBQ with friends and family
This home is brimming with features, including:
• Master bedroom features a large walk in robe and ensuite with ceaserstone benchtop and shower
• Three more bedrooms, all with built in robes and sizeable enough to make your self feel comfortable
• Modern kitchen features a 40 mm caecarstone benchtop, 900mm upright cooker and oven
• Dishwasher
• Zoned ducted heating
• LED downlights throughout
• Remote controlled lock up garage with internal access
• Fencing and Front Landscaping

Description:
Build your dream home
First Home Buyers – Pay attention! If you’re looking for generous block size, convenient location and to be part of a newly establish community - look no further!
The titled block itself offers approx. 313m2 of land – plenty of space to build your ideal future home and is nestled on neat allotment with no easement. Ideally situated, the block is also close to some fantastic amenities both established and proposed. These include future proposed parks and playgrounds, BBQ’s and public artworks. Established amenities nearby include Shopping on Clyde, Selandra Rise Shopping Centre, Casey Fields, Casey RACE and several local Primary and Secondary Schools.
Don’t miss this opportunity to join the Edgebrooke community!
